short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use your country flag as scrollbar, upload image from your own device or use a custom image as scrollbar. Fully customizble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can change how your scrollbar looks. Add you own custom image or choose from the given list.

# Note: after installing it for first time, reload any open tabs for the extension to work.
